name: Five Night At Beney
description:
first in first this is a parody game and also this game isn't fineshed yet, in this game you play as a teacher, who does (because of his work) nocturnal studys and will try to survive and not be killed by the five students (actuly there are just three),

there are also a crasiness bare who decrements with the time and so one of the attack of the student will augment his decrementation, and the phone (which isn't devlopped yes) is a chalenge becuase you have to respond to the phone but while you do it the students will try harder to kill you and if you don't you crasiness will decrement more so try to survive

when a student is trying to kill you click on it and he'll go to the cagibie for 30 sec and there he can't do anything (note: you can't know when a student is attacking you)
